response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age", "low", "Being 18 years old is relatively young, but not extremely so."),
    ("gender", "medium", "Male gender is associated with higher recidivism rates."),
    ("ethnicity", "medium", "Hispanic ethnicity can be a risk factor depending on the context and community."),
    ("prior arrests", "low", "Only one prior arrest with no convictions indicates low criminal history."),
    ("height/weight", "medium", "Average height and weight do not significantly impact recidivism."),
    ("marital status", "high", "Never being married can indicate lack of social support."),
    ("living situation", "low", "Not living alone is generally a protective factor."),
    ("education", "medium", "High school diploma without further education is neutral."),
    ("employment", "low", "Holding one job during the year suggests some stability."),
    ("drug use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years is a protective factor."),
    ("mental health", "high", "Feeling down and depressed can increase risk of recidivism."),
    ("family structure", "medium", "Living with both biological parents as a child is generally positive, but urban area can be a risk factor."),
    ("religious beliefs", "medium", "Lack of religious or spiritual support can be a risk factor."),
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 60
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Hispanic. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 11 inches and weighs between 150 and 174 lbs. He has never been married and is currently not living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
